title: Remorse
description: She escaped him, but can she escape her heart?Three years ago, I fled the country to escape Arthur Rhodes' clutches. He was too raw.Too dangerous.Just too much.Now, I'm back to save my father's company. But I will never get lost in Arthur's maze again.Or that's what I tell myself.Available for free download from author websiteRemorse is contemporary romance and the prequel story to The Rhodes series. It introduces the world of the British aristocracy in which the series will take place. It's a standalone story and has a happy ending.
author: Rina Kent
